title: This game teach you to kiss ass and play like a bitch
body:
I can easily climb back up to high elo when I play like a bitch pretending to work with the team accepting toxic behavior from others, but I can also let myself drop all the way to B 5 from gold  by acting like any normal human being would. There is a problem with this game if you behave the way this game teaches you

you'll never get anywhere in life, and take my words for it I'm a successful investor and I only have a "career" for fun.
